title: What's the point of Armor?
body: Guinsoo's, Conqueror, New IE, Last Whisper buffs. You might as well just stack health at this point.

In 8.10 {{champion:498}} will be the go to Adc, because she is the only adc who can use overcapped Crit to boost her damage (E with a hypothetical 180% crit rate = 90% increased damage from E, and new {{item:3031}} makes that possible in 3 Zeal items, with room for 2 flat AD items to boost it.)
{{champion:202}}

I have my own thread on this topic. Turned out Jhin, Ashe, and Caitlyn all cap out at 100% crit, even on their damage modifiers. Xayah is the exception. 

I theorize her E damage in increase to crit chance is overcapping, because the programming is such that 100% Crit only = a 50% Increase in E damage. SO it'd take 200% Crit to reach 100% Increased damage.

Atm, you can reliably get her to 180%, so 90% on the 8.10 items. You were lucky to get 50% on 8.9, if you had {{item:3508}} {{item:3094}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3031}} , because her other item tended to be {{item:3072}} or {{item:3033}} 

Now, she'll probably build {{item:3031}} {{item:3094}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3085}}  (180% crit), and {{item:3036}} or {{item:3072}} .

At a minimum, she'll have 120% which is still a 10% increase in E damage per feather (which means those near misses are now going to be kills)

In that case she is really asking for some hotfix. And its not that hard to do. Hardcap her dmg bonus to E at number where she hits 100% crit.
I hope RIOT wont let her just run away with this. I would prefer to have more than one ADC option for bot.

I'd much rather see a Riven top pull off some sweet plays than watching a Maokai press keys on top of my adc and be 10x more effective. So yeah, screw armor :)

Those champs require skill to be effective. If you're doing poorly, you'll be dead weight to your team, whereas if you're playing something like Sion, Maokai, Malphite, etc. you'll be allways useful because of their retarded base damages and cheap itemization (not to mention utility). There's a reason why pro players play tanks. It's because they're better than bruisers. Watching the best top laners in the world play the easiest class is just depressing. Same applies for soloq.
